response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value to us and is worth $1,000,000 in our books. Given its significance and the unique benefits it offers, we believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection or business. Considering its worth and the potential it holds for you, we are offering this exceptional product to you at an exclusive price of $950,000. This is a special opportunity to acquire such a high-quality item at a highly competitive rate. We look forward to your consideration and hope to facilitate a transaction that benefits both parties.", "product_price": 950000}
